posts.title: Black Clover Teases Yuno's new power.
posts.desc: Black Clover is in the midst of the Royal Knights arc in the anime series, and thus is in the middle of a fierce tournament where many new powers and characters will be tested.
posts.author: Toyer

posts.title: 'One Piece' Reveals Sanji's New Bounty
posts.desc: Before the events of One Piece's Whole Cake Island arc revealed more about his past, Sanji's wanted poster was an interesting mystery. He had a bounty of 177 million belly, and could only be taken in alive when the rest of his crew was labeled as dead or alive.
posts.author: Nick Valdez
